tag_professor: Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
stu_tags: CARING  AMAZING LECTURES  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: She is by far the best prof I have ever had. She really cares about her students and makes everything very interesting. If you are taking a marketing class I highly recommend her. Not only you will love the class but also take away something from it that you can use for real life.

comments: Fun class, lots of random work. Definitely don\'t bother buying the textbook. Group work isn\'t the best. Must know your terms and models for her exams.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
stu_tags: SO MANY PAPERS  RESPECTED  GROUP PROJECTS
comments: Great prof. She knows her stuff and asks frequently for feedback. Group paper is crazy long, so get an early start.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Marjorie is Amazing! She is extremely smart and teaches the class great. She engages with the class and includes the class in examples. If you pay attention and study you will do great, she is also extremely helpful!

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Marjorie is by far the best Marketing Prof. in Edwards. She makes the classes extremely interesting and fun. She is also very helpful. She knows her stuff.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Marjorie is so nice! Good instructor. Makes class fun. Exams are relatively easy, but you still need to study and attend class. Took as commerce elective and did well. She is approachable and will always take the time to help you out.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: One of the few good profs in Edwards. Always happy to be there and ready to teach and help. Marks were good for everyone and lectures were made fun with funny (not marked) clicker questions, jeopardy and videos. If you get the chance, take a class with her, it will be well worth your time and will boost your grade

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: She is very helpful and generous ... got a 95% on my term paper that probably woulda been a 70 from any other prof. Take this class with her, you\'ll come out with an 80 for sure
